overview: After RTD Documentaryâ€™s film MH17: A year without truth was released in July of 2015, the Dutch Saftey Board (DSB), which is responsible for investigating the technical aspects of the crash, contacted RT. It asked for help in retrieving the plane parts remaining at the MH17 crash site that were featured in the film.
tagline: Experts' opinions on the tragedy and its investigation
title: Reflections on MH17
